name: warracker
description: Warracker is a self-hosted tracker for game achievements or war reports, collecting stats and presenting them in dashboards and leaderboards via a browser interface.
features: Achievement tracking: Monitor game achievements, trophies, and milestones across multiple gaming platforms.
Statistics dashboard: View comprehensive stats including completion rates, playtime, and progress metrics.
Leaderboards: Compare achievements and progress with friends or community members through competitive rankings.
Game library: Maintain a catalog of games with completion status, ratings, and personal notes.
Progress visualization: See achievement progress with charts and graphs showing completion percentages over time.
Multi-platform support: Track achievements from Steam, PlayStation, Xbox, and other gaming platforms simultaneously.
Custom goals: Set personal gaming goals and track progress toward completing specific games or achievement sets.
Activity feed: View recent achievements and updates from tracked players in a chronological timeline.
Rarity indicators: Identify rare or difficult achievements with rarity percentages and completion statistics.
Export functionality: Generate reports or export achievement data for sharing or backup purposes.
Mobile responsive: Check achievement progress and leaderboards from mobile devices with an optimized interface.
Privacy controls: Choose which achievements and stats to share publicly or keep private.
